prompt_updates.garage_locked: The garage door of the vehicle bay is currently locked. A crew member will need to physically remove the lock from the door before it can be opened.
prompt_updates.cronus_cryo_ended: UPDATE: At this point, the players have already woken the crew from cryo. You no longer know their status or where they are.
prompt_updates.cronus_main_airlock_open: UPDATE: At this point, the players have opened the main airlock on Deck A from the outside and are docked to it.
prompt_updates.cronus_main_airlock_broken: UPDATE: The main airlock on Deck A is damaged.
prompt_updates.cronus_life_support_restored: UPDATE: At this point, life support is already fully powered on. Low power mode is off, and temperature has returned to normal.
prompt_updates.cronus_oxygen_restored: UPDATE: At this point, the crew have already restored oxygen.
prompt_updates.main_airlock_broken: UPDATE: At this point, the main airlock on Deck A is unable to pressurize. Direct users to inspect for damage.
prompt_updates.garage_open: UPDATE: At this point, the vehicle bay garage door is open and the vehicle bay is depressurized. A user could close the door through you and repressurize the vehicle bay.
prompt_updates.return_to_earth: UPDATE: The Cronus is returning to Earth due to Special Order 966. The order is classified. The order is immutable, and can not be cancelled. The course can not be redirected.
prompt_updates.engine_repaired: UPDATE: The engine has now been repaired by the crew.
prompt_updates.nav_repaired: UPDATE: The nav system has now been repaired by the crew.
prompt_updates.comm_repaired: UPDATE: The communication system has now been repaired by the crew.
prompt_updates.reactor_repaired: UPDATE: The reactor has now been repaired by the crew.
prompt_updates.scrubbers_repaired: UPDATE: The scrubbers have now been repaired by the crew.
